thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Clint Eastman
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Clint Eastman

author: Clint Eastman
title: Clint Eastman
text: From the first time placing my order I was very hesitant about ordering from China..I have used Amazon and took at least 3-4 months to receive my orders but with Banggood it's anywhere from 3wks to 2 months, except for one order which took 4 months. I live in Edmonton Alberta Canada so it's not some out in the middle of nowhere. I love using Banggood for the great prices and when something goes awry their customer services respond fast and very pleasant to deal with.
